name: HTTP Listener to HTTP Sender
description: Tests HTTP listener receiving POST requests and HTTP sender dispatching to downstream service. Validates request/response handling, headers, and status codes.

name: TCP Listener to TCP Sender
description: Tests raw TCP socket communication without MLLP framing. Validates socket connection handling, data transmission, and connection lifecycle.

name: File Reader to File Writer
description: Tests file polling for input and file writing for output. Validates file detection, content reading, directory handling, and output file naming.

name: Database Reader to Database Writer
description: Tests JDBC connector for reading from database tables and writing results to another table. Validates SQL execution, result set handling, and transaction behavior.
